title: Qadri grieved over lives loss in train accident
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 03 (APP):Minister for Religious Affairs and Interfaith Harmony Noor-ul-Haq Qadri Friday expressed his sorrow and grief over the killings of Sikh Yatrees in train accident.
In his condolence message, the minister said he felt pain and agony of Sikh community and directed Evacuee Trust Property Board (ETPB) to maintain close contact with the families of the deceased and injured members of the Sikh community.
He directed extending optimum help to the bereaved families.
